title: This Tastes
subtle: Concept (fiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: What is your favorite food? How would you describe how your favorite food tastes? This Tastes is a charming story that introduces students to some powerful adjectives to describe how different foods taste. The adorable illustrations and repetitive text will help support early emergent readers. The book can also be used to teach students how to classify information and to connect to prior knowledge to better understand the text.
reviewWords: bitter, bland, juicy, old, sour, spicy
comprehension: Classify Information                : Classify information in a text
awareness: Initial Sound                : Discriminate initial consonant /t/ sound
grammar: Capitalization                : Capitalize the beginning of sentences
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word this
